    1. score(GameState, Move)

Interface Heuristic

All Known Implementing Classes:
CentralityHeuristic, ConnectivityHeuristic, LinearCombinationHeuristic, ShortestPathHeuristic
public interface Heuristic
A heuristic interface for evaluating the quality of moves in a game state. Heuristics provide strategic guidance by scoring potential moves, allowing AI agents to prioritize more promising moves during search.

Implementations of this interface should return higher scores for moves that are strategically better according to their specific evaluation criteria.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    score(GameState state, Move move)
    Evaluates and scores a potential move in the given game state.

  • Method Details

    • score

      double score(GameState state, Move move)
      Evaluates and scores a potential move in the given game state.
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state in which the move is being evaluated
      move - the move to be scored
      Returns:
      a score representing the quality of the move, where higher values indicate better moves according to this heuristic's criteria
